name: BNNSLayerParametersArithmetic
desc: A structure that contains the parameters of an arithmetic layer.

items.name: init(arithmetic_function: BNNSArithmeticFunction, arithmetic_function_fields: UnsafeMutableRawPointer, activation: BNNSActivation)
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic layer parameters structure.

items.name: var arithmetic_function: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: The arithmetic operation of the layer.

items.name: var arithmetic_function_fields: UnsafeMutableRawPointer
items.desc: A pointer to an arithmetic function field structure.

items.name: var activation: BNNSActivation
items.desc: The activation function that the layer applies to the output.
